analysis.description:
SNTGiveaway.processRequest (/unique_chucks/33/0x3f53eb87b841323fecc4deceebceaca58f4dfc72.sol#169-184) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- _dest.transfer(ethAmount) (/unique_chucks/33/0x3f53eb87b841323fecc4deceebceaca58f4dfc72.sol#182)

SNTGiveaway.manualSend (/unique_chucks/33/0x3f53eb87b841323fecc4deceebceaca58f4dfc72.sol#195-207) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- _dest.transfer(ethAmount) (/unique_chucks/33/0x3f53eb87b841323fecc4deceebceaca58f4dfc72.sol#204-205)
SNTGiveaway.boom (/unique_chucks/33/0x3f53eb87b841323fecc4deceebceaca58f4dfc72.sol#208-214) allows anyone to destruct the contract
